$:/xp/mark-button/macros/cssmark-colour-.text:
\define cssmark-colour-picker-inner(actions) <$button tag="a" tooltip="""$(colour-picker-value)$"""> $actions$ \end \define cssmark-colour-picker(actions)
--- <$list filter="Red Green Blue Brown Gray Orange Pink Purple Turquoise Violet Yellow" variable="colour-picker-value"> <$macrocall $name="cssmark-colour-picker-inner" actions="""$actions$"""/>
\end

$:/plugins/xp/mark-button/readme.title: $:/plugins/xp/mark-button/readme
$:/plugins/xp/mark-button/readme.text:
A button ({{$:/xp/images/marker}}) for the Editor toolbar that applies coloring or highlighting to the selected text
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/mark}} > See also: [[$:/plugins/tg/mark-button|http://tw5custom.tiddlyspot.com/#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Ftg%2Fmark-button]] !! Issues You can use `@@color:red;WORD@@` for color marking in English sentences, but it does not apply to Chinese sentences: ``` 欢迎来到 TiddlyWiki，这是一款独特的@@color:red;非线性@@笔记本，用于@@color:red;捕获@@、@@color:red;组织@@和@@color:red;分享@@复杂信息。 ``` 欢迎来到 TiddlyWiki，这是一款独特的@@color:red;非线性@@笔记本，用于@@color:red;捕获@@、@@color:red;组织@@和@@color:red;分享@@复杂信息。 > See also: $:/core/modules/parsers/wikiparser/rules/styleinline.js
